text: RT @WildJustice_org: Good morning! In our latest newsletter (free: https://t.co/d6cqYx1wKE) we asked for suggestions for future projects.‚Ä¶
@EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm Could the Proceeds of Crime Act and confiscation apply? Presumably this was done with intent for profit.
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency And any agricultural subsidies received by the perpetrator permanently removed. Here is a chance to make a real example to the Wye river basin.

RT @CraigBennett3: BEFORE & AFTER

Appalling #EcoVandalism at The #RiverLugg SSSI #Herefordshire

THIS IS ILLEGAL ACTIVITY

So it's a CRITI‚Ä¶
RT @sunkfarmer: @CraigBennett3 @JohnSensible @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WildlifeTrusts Thats not the same location!!

@DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Great to see wanton environmental plunder given seriousness it deserves @DaveThroupEA 

3 questions

1 What options exist for charges once evidence is collected?

2 Would an ecocide law help this? 

3 Are you aware of EA colleagues attending HS2 sites? Is this within EA role?

üôè
